title: Delta variant challenges China's zero Covid strategy — and raises questions over its vaccine efficacy
content:
1. Delta variant challenges China's zero Covid strategy — and raises questions over its vaccine efficacy  CNN
  2. China tests millions as Nanjing airport outbreak sees Covid cases surge  The Guardian

  5. Nanjing airport coronavirus cluster  CGTN America
